DOC.brief_summary: In part 1 project clinical efficacy specific neck rehabilitation compare standard primary health care among patient cervicogenic headache study whether fear avoidance beliefs self-efficacy predict long term neck function headache frequency superior active range neck movement . Part 2 investigate whether patient cervicogenic headache change cerebral grey white matter connectivity rest state state network , whether reverse effective neck rehabilitation , correlate symptom severity degree disability .
DOC.brief_title: Specific Neck Rehabilitation Unilateral Neck Related Headache Structural Changes Brain
DOC.detailed_description: The project include two part : Part 1 : With longitudinal semicross-over randomize control design ( n : 42 ) investigator compare clinical efficacy 6 month specific neck rehabilitation standard primary health care patient cervicogenic headache . The patient either receive specific neck rehabilitation program , 6 month standard primary health care cross neck rehabilitation . Sociodemographic clinical characteristic collect treatment session 6 12 month later . Whether self-efficacy fear avoidance beliefs predict 12 month self-reported neck function headache frequency superior active range neck movement study . Part 2 : With non-randomized comparative design investigator explore whether change cerebral grey white matter volume structure measure volumetric MRi diffusion tensor imaging ( DTI ) , whether cerebral connectivity within default mode network ( DMN ) significantly different patient cervicogenic headache healthy control . Cerebral connectivity measure rest state fMRI ( RS-fMRI ) . Whether anticipate cerebral change volume , structure connectivity reverse specific neck rehabilitation test , whether change correlate symptom severity degree disability Analyses MRI scan clinical characteristic perform treatment session 6 month later . Baseline data compare correspond data 25 healthy control receive treatment . Those perform analysis blind group assignment . Statistics : Power calculation base previous study pilot data indicate number 21 patient within treatment group 25 health control would sufficient obtain statistical power 80 % p-value 5 % part 1 2 . Baseline 6 month data use `` group '' comparison 12 month data wil also include `` within-group '' comparison . Statistical predictor analysis perform regression analysis .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral headache neck pain 2 Minimum one headache attack pr week ( numeric rating scale ≥4 ) Five Antonaci 's seven diagnostic criterion Neck Disability Index score > 8 Points ( 16 percent point ) . For healthy control : • Same age distribution Progressive disease ( rheumatoid arthritis , cancer ) Ongoing cervical infection Neurological disease ( syringomyelia , radiculopathy , multiple sclerosis , Parkinson 's disease ) Other systemic disease ( Hypertension , hyperlipidemia , diabetes mellitus , heart disease , cerebrovascular vascular disease ) Other headache ( > 1 tension type headache migraine attack every month ) Other pain condition ( include temporomandibular disorder generalize pain ( fibromyalgia pain intensity > 6 digital palpation ) Dysmenorrhea require analgesic pain condition . Previous ongoing drug abuse Serious psychiatric disorder . Hopkins Symptom Checklist25 score depressive symptom > 2.2 Ongoing litigation process Intolerance MRI Pregnancy lactation For healthy control : Exclusion criterion Chronic pain Chronic dizziness
